trans-unit.source: {2}{U}{U}: Look at the top five cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and exile the rest.
trans-unit.target: o2oUoU：检视你牌库顶上的五张牌，并将其中一张牌置入你的手牌中。将其它牌移出游戏。

trans-unit.resname: ALL·26 | Diminishing Returns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各将其手牌和坟墓场洗回其牌库。你放逐你牌库顶的十张牌。然后每位牌手各抓至多七张牌。
trans-unit.note: 中文数据来自EMA（2016-06-10）；
中文数据来自MMQ（1999-10-04）；
